Articles.Content:
This is a game where someone posts a replica they made in ksp, and then the next person makes and posts a replica of that replica. Then the next person makes a replica of the replica's replica, and so on.

Each replica is slightly different from the last due to simple human error, lack of effort (which is totally fine), or just being silly and posting something different (which is also totally fine) so it should be interesting to see how long it takes for the original ship completely change/ disintegrate into a bunch of random parts.

Let's begin with this: The most popular craft on KerbalX, the STS-7 space shuttle replica by Inigma

Edited June 22, 2016 by quasarrgames
This is an amazing idea. Sort of like "telephone." However, my 1.1.3 is only 30% downloaded. I will, soontm.

On 21/06/2016 at 9:48 PM, Ultimate Steve said:

This is an amazing idea. Sort of like "telephone." However, my 1.1.3 is only 30% downloaded. I will, soontm.

Looking forward to it, my friend!
